review:
He is one miraculous doctor, a blessing to people in Delhi ncr with immense knowledge & expertise in his field. When i saw every physician of Jaipur failing to cure the recurring high fever (104) of my mother since 2.5 months, i went to him with high hopes in Max Shalimar bagh through Dr Alok Kalyani. He took his time and gone through all Ct scans endless blood reports which all were correct showing no sign of any infection, then suggested Pet- ct also which showed no sign of malignancy. He didn‚Äôt left hope after that also and was prompt in suggesting a test for Brucella which was the only reason for high prolonged fever. Brucella is rare and i wonder when will Jaipur physicians learn about this.?! I doubt there profession as they had putted every drug for fever. 
I was aback by Nagrani Sir competence as a General Physician, a big salute to such a humble & senior doctor who was risking his life coming into the room of the patient during covid to do his duty. Big thanks to him for saving us where we hardly had hopes about how the fever will stop, jaipur doctors (ehcc, soni hospital) showed up the bills of 9 lacs without any cure. He came out as a blessing for us, can never thank him enough for saving my mom. üôèüôå
And also big thanks to Dr. Alok kalyani for taking me to the best. üëè

*** **** ****** **** * **** **** **** *** *** ** *** ****** ***** *** will always try to guide and help a patient with the best of his abilities. In the year 2004, Dr Nagrani is the only Doctor who was able to save my father's life. My father owes his life to him and my family cannot thank him enough. Please consult Dr Nagrani before going anywhere else for a major surgery. Highly recommended.

I took my father to this doctor for fever cough n cold.** ******* *** **** ******** ***** *** put him on antibiotics for more than 15 days.When we visited him for review he had no time to discuss n even when I called him on emergency he did not gave me advice so that I can take him for treatment. When we visited him for consultation he did not give us proper attention . When he was unable to  find the remedy he was very rude in his behaviour and kept prescribing new antibiotics ** **** ******* ***** *** ** *** I would not recommend him to anyone.

Very nice & friendly doctor.Even in case of emergency he is available over phone for any type of guidelines may be thru his assistant.Give total satisfaction to the patient.The only problem that I feel is very high waiting time against the appointment time given.
Overall I would recommend him as a very nice doctor **** ******** ********* ** *** ******

My mom was chronic patient of asthma n diabetes. She was having problems in breathing n medicines were not working. Specially during Covid times , when such problems sends a wrong signal, Dr. Nagrani promptly helped her and now after consulting Dr. S.K. Nagrani , she got much required relief and her revised medications are working great for my mom. Thanks a lot for Dr. Nagrani ‚Äòs timely advice and genuine concern.
